channel.title: Seafood on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Seafood on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Elliot's Oyster House
item.description: I’ve been coming out here for work, and it’s been challenging to find a time when I can document food that’s not in a big party atmosphere. This is one of the few times, where I can actually try and ponder over the food that I’ve eaten. We picked this place because it’s near the touristy areas of Pike Place Market and is next to a ton of seafood based restaurants on the waterfront. One might think that must mean the food should be pretty good.
